channel.id: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from south-west London compete for the £1,000 prize, beginning with butchers Roland and Anne. Second host Penny hopes that her organisational skills can help her gain points, but partner Thom's revelation threatens to embarrass her. Fancy-dress enthusiasts Tony and Rebecca host the final evening, with a dessert based on Tower Bridge and a starter resembling a rugby pitch.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: The owner of London Road Pawnbrokers in Sheffield has to deal with a bus-load of antiques and a watch once owned by Saddam Hussein. Meanwhile, 200 miles away at Pickwicks in London, Nathan and Debbs value an impressive collection of jewels and watches, a set of antique coins and a pair of luxury designer handbags.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: At London Road Pawnbrokers in Sheffield, an unusual Harley-Davidson motorbike, an antique flapper purse and a pair of solid gold coins keep Dan and his assistant Ellie busy doing high-end deals. At Nikolas Patrick in Kent, staff broker a deal on a fur coat and ring, and a 100-year-old music player.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: The property experts head to London, where Phil Spencer helps first-time buyers Jo and Pete, who are looking for a place together in the areas of Archway and Holloway for around £400,000. Meanwhile, in West Hampstead, Kirstie Allsopp seeks out a family home for Tham and Krish that falls into the preferred school-catchment area for their daughter.(n)

programme.title: Best of Both Worlds
programme.desc: Lucy Alexander helps two sets of house hunters, including Rebecca and Gerhard in Bedfordshire, who want to have the great outdoors as their playground, but still be close to town.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final day of the competition sees Ross and Kath from The Kilpeck Inn confront Julie and Gerry's low hosting score, and accusations of tit-for-tat game-playing start to fly.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Five amateur chefs compete for the £1,000 prize in Kingston upon Thames, south-west London, and keen basketball player Ken Oputa is the first to host, inviting his guests to turn up in sportswear fancy dress. He hopes his Double Dribble mushrooms and Slam Dunk salmon will prove to be winning ingredients.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Interior designer Erika Sager hosts the second dinner party of the week on board her boat in Kingston upon Thames, south-west London, and invites her guests to dress up as pirates. Despite the unconventional setting, her rivals are all impressed by the standard of her food and hospitality.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Mother-of-two Sarah Brice hosts the third dinner party in Kingston upon Thames, hoping to impress her guests with her own take on dishes including prawns, lamb and chocolate mousse. Ken Oputa tries to make an impression on the female contestants with his romantic poetry, but finds Erika Sager switches her attentions to his rival Jamie Baker.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Photographer Jamie Baker hosts the fourth party in London, and his ambitious menu of langoustine and crab ravioli, herb crusted rack of lamb, and milloux of chocolate - combined with his choice of evening entertainment - go down well, until an unexpected turn of events scuppers his plans.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Retired golfer David Witcher hosts the final evening in Kingston upon Thames, south-west London, and hopes to impress with an American-themed menu, including Wyoming slow-cooked ribs and Louisiana seafood chowder. After dinner, he entertains his guests with a bucking bronco, before the winner of the £1,000 prize is announced.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay is in New Jersey to help Rose Leone, who spent two years in a coma and came out of hospital to learn her son Michael had run her once-thriving Italian restaurant into the ground. With a menu of more than 126 dishes, the quality of the food is suffering, and even the chefs refuse to eat their own creations.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay heads to the Park's Edge restaurant in Atlanta, Georgia, where a series of spats with the local community are hampering its success. Owners Richard and Jorge's in-fighting has alienated locals, and the duo's suggestion that customer numbers are low because of racism has heightened tensions.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer meet two couples who know exactly what they want and aren't afraid to say it. In the Essex countryside, Kirstie helps Tom and Lisa find a family home on a £1million budget, while in east London, Phil assists design-conscious James and Anisha, who have been searching for their first place together for almost two years.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Noel Fitzpatrick faces a new challenge when he is called upon to save the life of a buzzard with a broken wing. A couple's beloved labrador turns up at the clinic with badly damaged elbow joints, and a pampered cat that is used to living the good life faces surgery to repair slipping knee-caps.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Pioneering veterinarian Dr Noel Fitzpatrick uses his talents to treat a puppy called Poppy, which has difficulties with walking, and a lurcher called Dylan needs help with a collapsed joint. The programme also features a one-year-old cat that was hit by a car on its first venture outside the house, leaving it requiring emergency treatment.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: `Deadly' (aka David) found fame with his UK garage crew, and though he may be confident on stage, he's shy and retiring with the ladies. Can he bring his A-game when he meet teaching assistant Helen? Other diners include rock fan Anthony, who meets retired nurse and fellow northerner Barbara. She's an amateur magician with a few dating tricks up her sleeve.(n)

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Exploring life at Liverpool Women's Hospital through the eyes of male midwife Chris, a former navy trauma medic. Cameras also follow 22-year-old Kiefer, the birthing partner for his girlfriend Sophie. Following life-threatening complications during the birth of their first child, can he hold it together this time?.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in Police Custody
programme.desc: This edition follows the case of a man who was attacked and left unconscious on the floor of a crowded pub for more than 30 minutes, but no-one is prepared to come forward and name the assailant. The next day, detectives from Bedfordshire Police seize CCTV footage from the pub and though they can clearly see the vicious assault, they are unable to easily identify who threw the punches. Cameras follow every twist and turn of the investigation as the officers try to overcome the wall of silence they face.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts the words-and-numbers game, with Jon Richardson and Joe Lycett taking on Sean Lock and Michelle Wolf. Adam Riches joins resident lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner and Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.(n)

programme.title: Gogglesprogs
programme.desc: Young TV viewers give their honest, inimitable and ultimately hilarious take on recent television programmes, from entertainment shows to documentaries, classic films and up-to-the-minute news stories.(n)

programme.title: The World's Weirdest Weather
programme.desc: A visit to a town in South Carolina where it's raining popcorn-like snow - actually little balls of ice called graupel that appear harmless but could trigger avalanches. Storm chaser Geoff Mackley films a dangerous concoction of volcanic ash, rocks, debris and water called lahar, and a man in Newfoundland records footage of a strange, rolling bank of fog that looks like a tsunami. In Canberra, there's a giant tornado born not from a thundercloud but from a colossal firestorm, while in the Peak District, strong winds defy gravity - blowing a waterfall upwards.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef comes to the aid of Lela's, a California restaurant that is currently being run into the ground by its inexperienced owner. Gordon tries to turn the failing business around, but faces opposition from the chef and makes enemies when he exposes the suspect behaviour of some members of staff.(n)

programme.title: Supershoppers
programme.desc: Anna Richardson and Andi Osho reveal which chocolates and biscuit brands to avoid when it comes to price. They look at how much it really costs to get a `free' coffee from the nation's biggest chains. The team also investigates travel insurance, and the high cost of West End theatre tickets.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition starts at the Poacher Inn in South Warnborough, Hampshire, where landlady Nadia Schicchi hopes her Italian directness and business approach will win the day.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to The Forest Country House in Powys, Wales, where owner Paul Martin, joined by best friend and neighbour, Jayne Kirk, hopes his luxury B&B will impress.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the week takes place at the Langside Bed and Breakfast in Fenwick, Scotland, where super-clean hosts Debbie and Jim McCalliog hope to wow their guests.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit is to The Tushielaw Inn in Selkirk, owned by Rab and Gail Forbes, who opened their historic inn just six months previously.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: As the B&B owners meet for the final time, Paul Martin and Jayne Kirk from The Forest Country House want to get to the bottom of Nadia's low scores.(n)

programme.title: Guy Martin: Last Flight of the Vulcan Bomber
programme.desc: The mechanic joins a select crew of engineers working to prepare the last Vulcan bomber that is capable of flight for a farewell tour of the UK. The programme features contributions from former crew members, who recall its service in conflicts from the 1950s to the Falklands, as well as serving as Britain's nuclear deterrent.(n)

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It
programme.desc: Barbara and Stephen have had 20 happy years in their Victorian riverside cottage in Surrey, but with retirement looming, they are undecided what to do next. Stephen loves their home, while Barbara dreams of starting afresh in a new home - where she would need a separate room for her drum kit. Phil Spencer comes up with a few options should they decide to up sticks, while Kirstie Allsopp is full of ideas allowing Barbara to get out her sticks. Will they decide to stay or sell?.(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Boat enthusiast James Strangeways invites Kevin McCloud to survey progress on the construction of his new home, which his architect nephew Ben Hebblethwaite has designed to be as `un-houselike' as possible. James has spent the past 35 years travelling the canals and waterways of Britain, and despite never liking houses, has decided now is the time to put down roots on dry land. Ben hoped a home standing on stilts above a marsh, and incorporating ship-like qualities such as a keel-shaped roof, will be enough to satisfy his boat-mad uncle. However, Ben's contractor goes into liquidation a few months into the project, taking £87,000 of the £300,000 budget, and when James decides to make a few tweaks to the design, alarm-bells begin to ring for the young architect.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay is in New Jersey to help Rose Leone, who spent two years in a coma and came out of hospital to learn her son Michael had run her once-thriving Italian restaurant into the ground. With a menu of more than 126 dishes, the quality of the food is suffering, and even the chefs refuse to eat their own creations.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: First of a two-part special in which Gordon Ramsay heads to the Burger Kitchen in Los Angeles, where tensions are running high because owner Alan Saffron has spent his son's entire inheritance on the struggling restaurant. To make matters worse, the kitchen is run by a chef called David Blaine who shares nothing of his famous namesake's magic when it comes to cooking - and whose threatening behaviour regularly gets him into trouble.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Part two of two. The chef continues his quest to transform the fortunes of the Burger Kitchen in Los Angeles, where tensions were running high because owner Alan Saffron had spent his son's entire inheritance on the struggling restaurant. Alan gets a wake-up call from internet critics, who he believes are trying to shut him down.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay visits family-run Luigi's in Orange County, California, where lazy shortcuts following the retirement of the owner's father have led the business to suffer. Ramsay faces the daunting task of reuniting a feuding family, before turning around the struggling restaurant, which currently has 126 dishes on the menu.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay uses his wealth of experience in the restaurant business to help struggling hotels, motels and B&Bs across America. He visits Meson de Mesilla, a Tuscan-style hotel in Las Cruces, New Mexico. Owner and former child-star Cali Szczawinski purchased the hotel so she could perform Cher songs every night to a captive audience, but Gordon investigates whether she may be falling flat when it comes to the needs of her guests because she's too busy trying to hit the high notes on stage.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Pioneering veterinarian Dr Noel Fitzpatrick uses his talents to treat a puppy called Poppy, which has difficulties with walking, and a lurcher called Dylan needs help with a collapsed joint. The programme also features a one-year-old cat that was hit by a car on its first venture outside the house, leaving it requiring emergency treatment.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts the words-and-numbers game, with Jon Richardson and Jonathan Ross taking on guest captain Lee Mack and Victoria Coren Mitchell. Jessie Cave joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner and Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: An 18-year-old is rushed in after breaking his leg while playing football, and doctors worry it may have long-term implications. Meanwhile, David, who is 29, is airlifted to St George's following a head-on collision at speed, and 94-year-old Mary arrives after falling backwards down 14 steps and losing consciousness.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Doctors treat a young woman who has been thrown from a horse, which then trampled on her, and also a woman who was hit by a car while riding her motorbike on a dual carriageway. Plus, an 11-year-old boy is brought into hospital after running into a wall at school and hurting his wrist.(n)

programme.sub-title: The Battle of Maddie v Chloe.
programme.desc: Maddie and Chloe have fought for first place in competitions and ultimately for a place in Abby's heart. However, the main rivalry may actually be between their mothers.(n)

programme.title: Dance Moms
programme.desc: Abby reveals her favourite group dances. Counting down to number one, she offers the inside story on how the dances came about and the drama behind the scenes. Plus, all-new extended cuts of the best Dance Moms dances.(n)

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules
programme.desc: Kerry is furious to learn that Paul is relaxing the household curfew for Bridget just because she is dating the best sportsman in the state - high-school basketball star Travis `the Rainman' Smith. John Ritter and Katey Sagal star.(n)

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules
programme.desc: Bridget tries out for the cheerleading squad, but Kerry is chosen instead. Meanwhile, Paul struggles to wean Rory off video games and get him interested in reading. Starring John Ritter.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids

programme.title: My Wife and Kids

programme.title: Dance Moms

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: In south London, father-and-son team Del and Dael Anglin face death threats from a debtor's father, after arriving at a property to collect a debt of over £3,500. Meanwhile, in east London, two agents are confronted with a tenant who claims to have had no prior warning that he is being evicted from his tiny bedsit. Del and Brian try to recover £6,000 owed by a London hotel to a catering supply company, and Paul and Steve must tackle a difficult eviction.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away

programme.title: Dance Moms

programme.title: My Wife and Kids

programme.desc: Mercenary leader Barney Ross is recruited by the CIA to recover a top-secret package, only to come to blows with a rival band of hired guns. Action thriller sequel, starring Sylvester Stallone and Jean-Claude Van Damme. Includes 5 News Update at 11pm.(n)

programme.title: Emerald City
programme.desc: Dorothy makes her way along a path of yellow poppies toward the city when she comes across a wounded soldier, strung up like a scarecrow and with no memory of who he is. She decides the wizard might be able to help him too - unaware the man she is on her way to visit is a scared tyrant who has imprisoned anyone who uses magic. Fantasy drama, starring Adria Arjona, Vincent D'Onofrio and Oliver Jackson-Cohen.(n)

programme.title: Top 20 Funniest
programme.desc: A countdown of the funniest video clips in America, from those that went viral to home movies, pranks, surveillance footage and news bloopers. Plus, a teenager shows his wicked side when he leaps off a see-saw and sends his friend crashing to the ground.(n)

programme.title: The Enforcer
programme.desc: The third film in the Dirty Harry series sees maverick cop Harry Callahan dealing with an underground terrorist group in his inimitable fashion. The People's Revolutionary Strike Force steal a truckload of weapons from an arms storehouse and threaten to blow the city to smithereens unless their demands are met. Harry is put on the case but seems to be more concerned by the fact that his new partner is a woman(n)

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: Endlessly imitated, The Terminator made the reputation of cowriter/director James Cameron -- who would go on to make 1997's titanic Titanic -- and solidified the stardom of Arnold Schwarzenegger. The movie begins in a post-apocalyptic 2029, when Los Angeles has been largely reduced to rubble and is under the thumb of all-powerful ruling machines. Kyle Reese (Michael Biehn), a member of the human resistance movement, is teleported back to 1984. His purpose: to rescue Sarah Connor (Linda Hamilton), the mother of the man who will lead the 21st-century rebels against the tyrannical machines, from being assassinated before she can give birth. Likewise thrust back to 1984 is The Terminator (Schwarzenegger), a grim, well-armed, virtually indestructable cyborg who has been programmed to eliminate Sarah Connor. After killing two "Sarah Connors" who turn out to be the wrong women, he finally aims his gunsights at the genuine article. This is the film in which Schwarzenegger declared "I'll be baaaack" -- and back he was, in "kinder and gentler" form, in the even more successful Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991)(n)

programme.title: Johnson Family Vacation
programme.desc: Comedian Cedric the Entertainer serves as both producer and star of this comedy about a family who discovers just how much can go wrong en route to a family get-together. When Nate Johnson (Cedric the Entertainer) is invited to a big family reunion in Missouri, he sees it as an opportunity to reconnect with his estranged wife and growing children, as well as a chance to show up his wealthier know-it-all brother, Mack (Steve Harvey). Nate takes delivery on an expensive new SUV, persuades his recently separated wife, Dorothy (Vanessa L. Williams), to tag along, and packs up his three kids -- nubile teenager Nikki (Solange Knowles), under-age wannabe rapper D.J. (Bow Wow), and precocious seven-year-old Destiny (Gabby Soleil) -- for what he imagines will be a leisurely drive from Los Angeles to St. Louis. However, between his wary wife, arguing kids, angry police officers, bizarre hitchhikers, bad diner food, and an unfortunate run-in with a cement mixer, getting from point A to point B proves to be just short of a nightmare. Johnson Family Vacation was the first feature film for director Christopher Erskin, who previously distinguished himself directing music videos for the likes of Missy Elliot, TLC, and Boyz II Men(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn
programme.desc: A meek young woman emigrates from Ireland to New York City in the 1950s, and finds her heart torn between a magnetic Italian suitor and a charming lad back home(n)

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: Five Oscars went to this enthralling biography of 20th-century icon Howard Hughes. The epic drama details Hughes' glory years from the 1920s to the '40s, when he earned a vast fortune making films and designing planes, while also romancing Jean Harlow and Katharine Hepburn(n)

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: A mother and her daughter hide in a fortified "safe room" when thieves break into their home(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, the rebel learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect the King's throne. The outlaw counts upon the support of his band of followers, including his Moorish companion, a drunken priest and the beautiful Maid Marian(n)

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: Biopic of entrepreneur Joy Mangano (Jennifer Lawrence), a divorced mother of two who risks her life's savings to produce and market her invention, the Miracle Mop. Joy faces opposition from her dysfunctional family, including her father Rudy (Robert De Niro), as they meddle in her burgeoning business. But when the head of the newly founded QVC network (Bradley Cooper) gives her a chance to sell her product on live TV, the Miracle Mop becomes a household name. The success of that invention later leads to a home-shopping empire and Joy's ascension to the matriarch of her extended family. David O. Russell directed this briskly paced comedy-drama, with Diane Ladd, Virginia Madsen, Isabella Rossellini, and Elisabeth Röhm co-starring(n)

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: Best Actor nominee Tom Hanks delivers as airfreight exec Chuck Noland, a plane crash survivor who washes ashore on a deserted island in the Pacific. For more than four years he struggles to stay alive, sustained only by the companionship of a volleyball and memories of his girlfriend (Helen Hunt). Robert Zemeckis ("Forrest Gump") directed. Chris Noth, Nick Searcy(n)

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Two young brothers visit an aunt who's an executive at Jurassic World, a theme park populated with genetically resurrected dinosaurs. But chaos erupts when a newly created dino escapes its enclosure, forcing the park's animal behaviorist to save the day(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: After an exploratory mission goes awry, lone astronaut Mark Watney (Matt Damon) is left for dead on the hostile surface of Mars and must use his scientific ingenuity to homestead an enclosed habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, the astronauts he left behind realize the severity of his plight and join forces with an international coalition of scientists to launch a rescue mission in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: K-PAX
programme.desc: The 1995 novel by Dr. Gene Brewer becomes this drama from director Iain Softley. After a mugging incident at New York's Grand Central Station, Prot (Kevin Spacey), a man who claims to be an alien from the planet K-PAX, is turned over to a public mental hospital and the care of Dr. Mark Powell (Jeff Bridges). When medication fails to alter Prot's insistence that he is visiting from another world on a fact-finding mission, Powell gets more involved with his patient, who seems to have a calming effect on the other residents of his ward. At first convinced that Prot is a delusional who can be treated, Powell begins to wonder if his bizarre patient's story is true, particularly after the hospital's doctors find that Prot possesses the baffling ability to see ultraviolet light. As the date grows nearer when Prot claims he must leave Earth (a "class BA-III planet"), Powell becomes increasingly concerned that a psychiatric breakthrough must occur by then. K-PAX (2001) co-stars Alfre Woodard and Mary McCormack(n)

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: About a couple of clowns who gain possession of a beautiful woman's briefcase. Lloyd is a limousine chauffeur who sets out to return the bag to Mary, one of his Clients.With his friend Harry, who runs a pet grooming agency, Lloyd sets off for the skiing resort of Aspen to give the bag back. The journey is fraught with hilarious complications, as the boys encounter mobsters, police and locals who are even more crazy t(n)

programme.title: Bachelor Party
programme.desc: Bawdy comic tale about a happy-go-lucky school bus driver who falls for a wealthy woman and decides to marry her, despite the disapproval of her snobbish parents. The night before the wedding, he and his friends decide to hold the stag party to end all stag parties, while his fiancee and her friends plan to spy on them. Meanwhile, her parents try to find a way of luring their daughter away from her unsuitable fiance(n)

programme.title: Wish I Was Here
programme.desc: A 35-year-old father who's never quite grown up learns about life when he's forced to homeschool his kids, since their grandpa can no longer afford their private-school tuition and their public school is a mess(n)

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: David Dobkin's festive comedy stars VInce Vaughn as Fred Claus, the slacker brother of Santa who has grown apart from his more successful brother. But needing to be bailed out of the slammer, Fred calls in a favour and Santa agrees to pay the money so long as Fred comes to Lapland and helps him with the Yuletide rush. And things are even stickier than Fred thought: there's an efficiency expert, Clyde, casting his eye over the operation with a view to closing it down. Can the estranged brothers pull together to save Santa's business? With Kathy Bates as Mother Claus, Miranda Richardson as Annette Claus and Rachel Weisz as Wanda(n)

programme.title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
programme.desc: Dr. Evil is back...and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 60's and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless"(n)

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: Bruce Lee is the martial artist competing with international bruisers and cracking an opium racket in his spare time. An explosive action feast for fight fans(n)

programme.title: Constantine
programme.desc: Chain-smoking loner Constantine tries to buy his place in Heaven by banishing Earth-bound demons back to Hell. But his fate is tied up with Angela, a cop investigating the alleged suicide of her twin(n)

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: Hereafter tells the story of three people who are touched by death in different ways. George is a blue-collar American who has a special connection to the afterlife. On the other side of the world, Marie, a French journalist, has a near-death experience that shakes her reality. And when Marcus, a London schoolboy, loses the person closest to him, he desperately needs answers. Each on a path in search of the truth, their lives will intersect, forever changed by what they believe might or must exist in the hereafter(n)

programme.title: Any Given Sunday
programme.desc: When a devastating hit knocks professional football legend Cap Rooney out of the game, a young, unknown player is called to replace him. His great performances leave everybody shocked and make things difficult for the returning Cap Rooney(n)

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: The true story of Texas electrician Ron Woodroof, who was diagnosed as HIV positive in 1986, and subsequently devoted his life to providing unapproved drugs and supplements to fellow HIV patients during an era when doctors were still struggling to understand the virus(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: The body of a woman who hacked a law office for a specific file is discovered in a water tank. It transpires she believed her actions were leading toward determining the killer of her best friend. Castle and Beckett investigate, while the pair's relationship reaches its next level. American crime drama, starring Nathan Fillion and Stana Katic.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the case of a woman killed in a fall from her art studio rooftop. When the post-mortem reveals the presence of a drug in her system, detectives suspect she was doped - but there is a long list of suspects. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A private investigator's murder draws Briscoe and Green toward a case of corruption in a baseball league - where the manager will do anything to ensure his team wins. They learn the victim had unearthed a scandal in which an ineligible player was being fielded in every game - and his discovery may have led to his death. Detective drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A wealthy businessman is killed at a charity event and suspicion falls on his wife, whose blood matches a sample found at the crime scene. However, it later transpires that she has a twin sister - and the victim had a double of his own. Crime drama, starring David Caruso, Adam Rodriguez and Khandi Alexander.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The agents investigate the murder of a marine during a cruise. They discover he came from a famous and wealthy family but had turned his back on a life of privilege to join the military, and after the death of his father had inherited a large part of his business. His decision to change his will may have pushed one of his relatives to kill him to keep the firm in their control. Crime drama, guest-starring Diane Neal (Law & Order: Special Victims Unit).(n)

programme.title: Cedar Cove
programme.sub-title: Cedar Cove: Christmas Special: A New Life.
programme.desc: Jack and Olivia face up to life apart, although neither are filled with good cheer as Christmas approaches. A pregnant young woman arrives in town and is given a job at Moon's coffee shop and the opportunity to play her guitar, while Peggy's nosiness leads her to a picture that may depict the father of the unborn child. Meanwhile, Seth returns with a business plan, and Justine becomes determined to find John after visiting a gallery in Seattle and uncovering a photograph taken by him.(n)

programme.title: Cedar Cove
programme.desc: Jack returns to Cedar Cove, and realises he is missing out when he learns his son Eric is to become a father. Cliff and Grace's feelings for each other grow warmer, while Maryellen tries to convince John to face up to his past after tracking him down to a hotel in Seattle. Seth and Justine's plans to open a restaurant go up in smoke, Justine is approached by a federal agent on the trail of Warren, and alarm bells ring for Eric and Shelly in the delivery room.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green are assigned to investigate the execution-style killing of a prominent businessman, and discover his wife was having an affair. However, further evidence emerges, suggesting a different motive - and an unlikely conspirator. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green look into the shooting of defence lawyer Vance Grodie, who had just won an acquittal for a suspected cop killer. Their investigations reveal a link to a network of conservative extremists, and the discovery leads the case into an examination of civil rights. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A suspected carjacker is murdered and the team believes he may have been involved in drug smuggling. To complicate matters, evidence suggests that Ryan, who is now working for local TV, could have inadvertently led the killer to his victim, a possibility that further distances him from his former colleagues. Crime drama, starring David Caruso.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The agents learn one of their former investigative assistants has been murdered, and had been selling information about how to rob a warehouse full of valuable possessions belonging to a woman convicted of fraud. As the case proceeds, Tony becomes infatuated with the new leader of another team, who apparently returns his feelings. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Homicide police hand the case of a retired marine colonel found murdered with an axe over to NCIS when they are unable to solve the case, despite all the circumstantial evidence pointing to the deceased's drug-addicted son. They discover the suspect's mother went missing two years previously and Ziva suggests he may have killed more than one parent, while the family's neighbour is revealed to also have had a motive for wanting the man dead. Crime drama, starring Michael Weatherly and Cote de Pablo.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Los Angeles
programme.desc: After a high-speed chase, Morales and Jaruszalski investigate the murder of a city worker found dead in the vehicle - but there is no sign of the driver.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A girl is kidnapped by a sex offender in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina, and efforts to find her are hampered by the interference of a pushy local journalist. She and her abductor are eventually located - but he dies of anthrax poisoning shortly afterwards, raising fears of a major outbreak.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An investigation into the near-fatal stabbing of a schoolboy leads the team to a female suspect who had been bullied by the victim because she was being raised by a gay couple. Her subsequent trial turns into a legal battle over the rights of same-sex parents - and leads to allegations that her guardian is guilty of abuse. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Part two of two. The wealthy and powerful Mulroney family is investigated for links to the Mafia, and Stabler hunts for Helen Katich, the only witness to Brecker's death - but her lifeless body is found in a car pulled from a river. However, the setback leads to a Mob hitman who provides information needed to pursue a case against the family.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a guidance counsellor at a private school, and continues to search for the elusive taxicab killer - a manhunt given added urgency by the mayor, who orders Mac and the others to drop everything and find the murderer before he strikes again. Drama, starring Gary Sinise, Melina Kanakaredes and Eddie Cahill.(n)

programme.title: Chicago PD
programme.desc: After turning up at Lindsay's house with his hands covered in blood, Justin claims he was in a bar fight - but Lindsay is certain there is more to the story. She decides to confide in Hank, but is swept aside as he focuses on an investigation into the death of a man who had links to the higher echelons of the criminal fraternity. Chicago Fire spin-off, starring Jason Beghe and Sophia Bush.(n)

programme.title: Chicago PD
programme.desc: The team hunts for someone who was prepared to kill to get their hands on some heavyweight explosives, while Voight's critic is silenced once and for all. Meanwhile, Antonio recovers enough to return to work, but he is disappointed with his assignment. Chicago Fire spin-off, starring Jason Beghe and Jon Seda.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance for viewers to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Catch a Contractor
programme.desc: Adam Carolla hunts for a contractor who turned a home into a potential deathtrap at risk of collapsing after he inadvertently removed a load-bearing wall.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and the team investigate the death of a hotel employee who plummeted from a balcony, and are alerted to another case by the sound of gunfire. Rushing to the scene, they find a woman who has shot dead a man for attacking her husband - an incident that brings back painful memories for Stella, who once killed a boyfriend in self-defence.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac, Hawkes and Lindsay investigate the death of a woman found on a subway train and discover that although her hands and face are covered in blood, she has no obvious injuries. Meanwhile, Danny and Stella visit the home of a playboy bachelor who drowned in his indoor pool - and are surprised to learn he has a wedding-cake decoration lodged in his lung. Crime drama, starring Gary Sinise.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of Eden
programme.desc: A small community is shocked when a local man murders his wife, then kills himself. A detective uncovers evidence of an affair between the dead woman and the town's pastor and begins to suspect he may be implicated in the tragedy. To learn the truth, she must gain the trust of the couple's troubled teenage daughter. Drama, starring John Stamos and Anna Gunn.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Murder with Too Many Notes
programme.desc: Oscar-winning composer Findlay Crawford relies on his assistant Gabriel to do all the hard work, but the younger musician demands recognition. To protect his reputation, Findlay kills Gabriel with a time-delayed drug to give himself the perfect alibi - but the slovenly sleuth sees through his ruse. Detective drama, with Peter Falk and Billy Connolly.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A navy recruitment officer is murdered at a high school and the agents discover he had recently begun a relationship with a married teacher whose wife held a grudge against him. They also find out a student's father was vehemently opposed to his joining the military, and receive help from an unexpected quarter - Ducky's esteemed predecessor, Dr Magnus. Crime drama, guest starring comedian Bob Newhart.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A former serviceman who had been having an affair is beaten to death in his own back garden, and the agents are forced to consider the possibility that his wife - a US Marine and martial arts expert - is the killer. Meanwhile, McGee becomes the subject of an embarrassing mix-up when an inflatable doll apparently purchased on his credit card is delivered. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.sub-title: A Man Walks into a Bar.
programme.desc: The agents are forced to undergo psychological evaluations conducted by Dr Rachel Cranston (guest star Wendy Makkena) while investigating the death of a submarine's commanding officer. Suspicion falls on a journalist seen arguing with the man before his demise, and Tony discovers a link between the psychotherapist shadowing the agents and Ziva's predecessor Kate Todd. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A marine dies while saving the life of a foreign defence secretary, who was the target of an assassination attempt. Gibbs and the team are given the task of protecting the politician's daughter while she studies in America, but fail to stop her being kidnapped and ransomed in a bid to prevent her father signing an important treaty. Crime drama, starring Sean Murray and Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A marine's teeth and fingertips are found in a pickpocket's stolen purse, and Ducky discovers he had been tortured on a rack before dying. The agents realise he may have been killed in error, and that the real target was his ex-girlfriend, a skilled player of computer games who unwittingly uncovered a mysterious code. Crime drama, starring Michael Weatherly and Sean Murray.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The agents investigate the deaths of two men killed in a shoot-out, but have to rely on a former naval intelligence officer suffering from post-traumatic stress disorder to help them close the case.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: LaSalle's family life seriously affects his work, when his brother Cade begs for help having found the body of his girlfriend Wendy in the boot of his car. With Cade having no recollection of the previous night's events, and his prints found on the rope used to hang Wendy, the team have to admit that the odds are stacked against him proving his innocence.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.sub-title: How Much Pain Can You Take?.
programme.desc: The elusive Baitfish murders LaSalle's girlfriend Savannah in an effort to send a threatening message to Pride. A city-wide manhunt is triggered and the investigation threatens to push a vengeful LaSalle over the edge - as well as endanger undercover contact Sonja Perry. Scott Bakula and Lucas Black star.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The trial of an alleged rapist is brought to an abrupt halt by the death of his accuser, who claimed he had made her pregnant - and subsequent developments suggest the accusations may have been false. Detective drama, starring Mariska Hargitay, Christopher Meloni and Dann Florek.(n)

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. On the air since 1966, it launched nationally in '72, before becoming the flagship of the Christian Broadcast Network in 1977. It mixes news---from a religious perspective---with inspirational interviews with celebrities, along with Bible readings and entertainment. Conservative icon (and 1988 presidential candidate) Pat Robertson founded the hugely popular program from a 1963 fund-raising pledge effort on UHF TV in Virginia(n)

programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. On the air since 1966, it launched nationally in '72, before becoming the flagship of the Christian Broadcast Network in 1977. programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The Sharpshooter. Created and written by Sam Peckinpah, the premiere episode of The Rifleman stars Chuck Connors and Johnny Crawford as Lucas and Mark McCain, father and 10-year-old son in search of settling down near North Fork, New Mexico. But when Lucas, a noted crack shot with a rifle, enters the local turkey shoot, he gets in the way of Jim Lewis (Leif Erickson), the local town czar, who has rigged the contest in favor of young Vernon Tippert (Dennis Hopper). All set to win the grand prize, Lucas is "persuaded" to throw the contest by Lewis, who uses little Mark as a bargaining tool. Sidney Blackmer and R.G. Armstrong also star in this fine television western, which premiered on ABC September 30, 1958(n)

programme.desc: In the science-fiction thriller Species (1995), Natasha Hentsridge appeared as the beautiful but deadly Sil, a human-alien DNA combo. In this sequel, Hentsridge portrays Eve, a government experiment concocted to gain an understanding of how to combat future aliens, while Michael Madsen and Marg Helgenberger repeat their roles from the earlier film. When astronaut Patrick Ross (Justin Lazard) returns from the first manned Mars expedition, he's infected with the same DNA that spawned Sil and Eve. Hailed as a hero, Ross is pressed into politics by his father (James Cromwell), a senator. Any woman who beds the sexually active Ross is immediately impregnated, with embryos quickly developing and killing the mother. Ross hides the offspring on a family estate, as LA cops begin to detect a pattern in the female deaths. At the lab where scientists are monitoring Eve, Dr. Laura Baker (Helgenberger) realizes that Eve has a telepathic link with Ross, and that these two hybrids hope to couple. Press Lennox (Madsen) and Colonel Burgess (George Dzundza) figure Eve can be used to lead them to Ross. Cleared as a murder suspect, Mars mission astronaut Dennis Gamble (Mykelti Williamson), joins Lennox and Baker and gets in on the action as everyone involved closes in on Ross. Richard Belzer does a cameo as the President of the U.S., while Peter Boyle makes an uncredited appearance as a scientist(n)

programme.title: Sugar
programme.desc: Filmmakers Ryan Fleck and Anna Boden (Half Nelson) weave this introspective sports drama concerning a talented Dominican baseball player who longs to break into the American big league and earn the money needed to support his impoverished family. Miguel Santos is a talented pitcher who might just have what it takes to earn a prized spot on a Major League Baseball team, but before that happens he'll have to prove his worth in the minor leagues. Advancing into the United States' minor league system at the tender age of 19, Miguel is warmly welcomed into the small-town Iowa home of his host family, but can't help but struggle with language and cultural barriers despite the kindness of strangers. Subsequently forced to reevaluate his life's ambition after his once-trusty arm becomes unreliable, the previously single-minded pitcher gradually begins to question both the world he lives in and the role he has chosen to play in it(n)

programme.title: On Time
programme.desc: A woman who is running late for a job interview is forced to make a tough decision. A finalist in the Short Film Competition at the 2016 American Black Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Cotton Club
programme.desc: A musician works with mobsters to advance his career but falls in love with the girlfriend of a gangland kingpin(n)

programme.title: Sudden Impact
programme.desc: While on a forced holiday due to his feud with a local crime lord, a San Francisco police detective becomes involved with a rape victim who has become a lethal vigilante(n)

programme.title: Bug
programme.desc: Agnes is running away from her ex boyfriend with her new boyfriend Peter. Peter is also on the run from the military - and bugs that he believes is going to take over his body. Together they seek shelter at a small motel. Soon Agnes also sees the bugs' crawling up from every corner witch is the start for a joint battle against the bugs. Slowly paranoia and fear takes over and threatens to destroy them both mentally and physically(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Jason Statham leads the cast of this high-octane action-thriller set in the post-industrial wasteland of tomorrow, with the world's most brutal sporting event as its backdrop. A penitentiary full of felons has inspired the jailers to create a grisly pastime ripe for lucrative kickbacks. Now, adrenalised inmates, a global audience hungry for televised violence and a spectacular arena come together to form the Death Race. From expert action director Paul W.S. Anderson and the producers of Mission: Impossible comes Death Race! The stakes don't get any higher than this!(n)

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: Humans and orcs clash in this film adaptation of the popular video-game series(n)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A mysterious artificial being evolves faster than anticipated, and a corporate consultant is enlisted to determine the test subject's fate(n)

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk
programme.desc: Scientist Bruce Banner (Edward Norton) have been living in shadows, seeking a cure to his unique condition, which causes him to turn into The Incredible Hulk, a giant green monster, under emotional stress. But the military forces who dream of abusing his powers won't leave him alone. Upon returning to civilization, Banner is ruthlessly pursued by a nightmarish beast whose powers match The Hulk's own. A fight of comic-book proportions ensues as Banner must call upon the hero within to rescue New York City from total destruction(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent infiltrates a group of extreme athletes who are using their specialized skills to pull off a series of complex crimes. This high-octane action thriller is a remake of the 1991 cult hit of the same name(n)

programme.title: Manhunter
programme.desc: Before Anthony Hopkins made his mark in the role, Brian Cox starred as Hannibal Lecktor [sic], the psychopathic killer cannibal and before Jodie Foster, there was Will Graham (William Petersen), an Fbi profiler brought out of retirement to catch the family-murdering 'Tooth Fairy' in Michael Mann's unrelenting thriller. Tortured by his past with Lecktor, Graham must confront him again to learn about his new enemy(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: When war veteran Colonel Terry Childers is hung out to dry by military chiefs, he turns to an old friend, army lawyer Colonel Hayes Hodges(n)

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: Based upon Mark Millar's explosive graphic novel series and helmed by stunning visualist director Timur Bekmambetov, Wanted stars Academy Award-winners Angelina Jolie and Morgan Freeman as members of a secret fraternity of assassins. James McAvoy portrays a slacker who is unexpectedly recruited to join the ranks of these elite fighters. As his powers and skills increase under their tutelage, however, he begins to waver between heroism and vengeance, and discovers that there is more to his dangerous associates than meets the eye. Starring Angelina Jolie, Morgan Freeman & James McAvoy(n)

programme.title: The Young Messiah
programme.desc: Based on the novel Christ the Lord: Out of Egypt by Anne Rice, The Young Messiah is a biblical drama that imagines the life of Jesus at age seven. As his family travel from Egypt to Nazareth, the young Jesus (Adam Greaves-Neal) wishes to learn more about his identity and place in the world. Meanwhile, Herod Antipas (Jonathan Bailey) dispatches a Roman centurion (Sean Bean) to hunt down and kill the boy, whose miraculous powers might be a threat to his reign. Sara Lazzaro and Vincent Walsh also star in this film from director Cyrus Nowrasteh(n)

programme.title: The Hunted
programme.desc: An American businessman in Japan becomes the quarry of a cult of ninja assassins after he witnesses a woman's murder(n)

programme.title: Tremors 4: The Legend Begins
programme.desc: When a wealth of silver is discovered in the vast Nevada desert, the small but almost immediately prosperous boomtown of Rejection is quickly established in order to support the Bottom Dollar Mine. Despite the riches beneath their feet that promise to put Rejection on the map and deliver wealth and prosperity to the small community, the fate of the town takes an ominous turn when 17 miners are mysteriously killed. As the fearful residents abandon the mines and flee the town, mine owner Hiram Gummer (series regular Michael Gross) takes matters into his own hands by leading the few remaining residents in a hunt to solve the mystery of the miners' deaths -- only to discover that the unearthly underground killer is a more powerful force than he may have ever imagined(n)

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: Programme details are currently unavailable(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: John Cena stars in this action adventure from Die Hard 2 director Renny Harlin. New Orleans cop Danny Fisher is given plenty of time to rue ever crossing paths with Miles Jackson, who makes his living supplying weapons to terrorists. A year earlier, a sting operation to capture Jackson resulted in the death of his girlfriend - and a vow of revenge from the criminal. Now, Jackson has escaped prison and is intent on making good his threat. He starts by blowing up Fisher's house and car, before explaining that he has kidnapped the detective's girlfriend, Molly. If Fisher wants to see Molly again, he must first complete a dozen fiendish tasks, most of which are designed to see Fisher blown to bits. And so begins a frantic, destructive rush around The Big Easy..(n)

programme.title: Lights Out
programme.desc: This utterly chilling horror film centers on a young woman who must protect her brother from a terrifying apparition that only manifests in total darkness. Later, she realizes that this fearsome entity is connected to her mentally ill mother, who has started hallucinating conversations with a mysterious figure named Diana(n)

But with great power comes great responsibility, as Spidey has to fight against the evil Green Goblin (Willem Dafoe) to save New York City from destruction. Will he succeed?(n)

Engineered to be an unstoppable killing machine, 47 is contracted by a covert organization to assassinate high-profile targets on a global scale. He's given the assignment to kill the leader of a crime syndicate who wishes to unlock the secrets behind 47's powers and harness that information into an army of highly skilled hit men.
